dcterms:creator: J. Mumtaz
Z. Guan
L. Yue
Z. Wang
S. Ullah
M. Rauf
dcterms:description: A dataset used for investigating a multi-level planning and scheduling problem of parallel printed circuit board assembly lines, aimed at maximizing net profit using a hybrid spider monkey optimization approach.
dcterms:title: Multi-Level Planning and Scheduling for Parallel PCB Assembly Lines

dcterms:creator: Q. Yan
H. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset for joint decision-making in dual resource-constrained aircraft assembly scheduling and flexible preventive maintenance, utilizing a double-layer Q-learning approach.
dcterms:title: Double-Layer Q-Learning-Based Joint Decision-Making of Dual Resource-Constrained Aircraft Assembly Scheduling

dcterms:creator: Y. Li
P. Cui
J. Wang
Q. Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on energy-saving control in multistage production systems, employing a state-based method to quantify production loss and reduce energy consumption.
dcterms:title: Energy-Saving Control in Multistage Production Systems

dcterms:creator: T. Yu
J. Huang
Q. Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset for mastering the working sequence in human-robot collaborative assembly, utilizing reinforcement learning for real-time task planning.
dcterms:title: Mastering the Working Sequence in Human-Robot Collaborative Assembly

dcterms:creator: D. Li
C. Zhang
G. Tian
X. Shao
Z. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset for a multiobjective program and hybrid imperialist competitive algorithm applied to mixed-model two-sided assembly lines under multiple constraints.
dcterms:title: Multiobjective Program and Hybrid Imperialist Competitive Algorithm for the Mixed-Model Two-Sided Assembly Lines

dcterms:creator: C. Zhao
N. Kang
J. Li
J. A. Horst
dcterms:description: A dataset for production control aimed at reducing starvation in a partially flexible production-inventory system.
dcterms:title: Production Control to Reduce Starvation in a Partially Flexible Production-Inventory System

dcterms:creator: X. Ma
X. Zhou
dcterms:description: A dataset for scheduling mobile robots in mixed-model assembly lines, considering workstation satisfaction and energy consumption.
dcterms:title: Research on the Scheduling of Mobile Robots in Mixed-Model Assembly Lines

dcterms:creator: Z. Bao
L. Chen
K. Qiu
dcterms:description: A dataset for studying an aircraft final assembly line balancing problem, considering resource constraints and parallel task scheduling.
dcterms:title: An aircraft final assembly line balancing problem considering resource constraints and parallel task scheduling

dcterms:creator: L. Cheng
Q. Tang
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset for a mathematical model and adaptive simulated annealing algorithm for mixed-model assembly job-shop scheduling with lot streaming.
dcterms:title: Mathematical model and adaptive simulated annealing algorithm for mixed-model assembly job-shop scheduling with lot streaming

dcterms:creator: C. Zhu
T. Yu
Q. Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset for task-oriented safety field for robot control in human-robot collaborative assembly based on residual learning.
dcterms:title: Task-oriented safety field for robot control in human-robot collaborative assembly based on residual learning

dcterms:creator: R. Zhang
J. Lv
J. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset for a graph-based reinforcement learning-enabled approach for adaptive human-robot collaborative assembly operations.
dcterms:title: A graph-based reinforcement learning-enabled approach for adaptive human-robot collaborative assembly operations

dcterms:creator: K.-H. Ho
R.-Y. Jheng
Ji-Han Wu
dcterms:description: A dataset for a new reinforcement learning approach to solving the job shop scheduling problem, termed residual scheduling.
dcterms:title: Residual Scheduling: A New Reinforcement Learning Approach to Solving Job Shop Scheduling Problem
